data.name: Rally 9000
data.detailed_description:
Rally 9000 is a simple 3D rally game. Complete tracks as fast as possible, and unlock levels and upgrades!
This game aims to deliver the best of arcade and simulation racing in one package!

Key Features:
1. Random wildlife events: wildlife may run out onto the the track at any given moment
2. Complex weather systems including rain, snow, and sand storms.
3. Day & night tracks.
4. Damageable vehicles
5. Online leader-boards
6. Local (offline) high-scores
7. Fantastical tracks
8. Consistent Bug Patches

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3rd Gen / AMD Ryzen 3 1300x
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 / Radeon R9 380
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6th Gen / Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 / AMD RX 5600-XT

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: May include wildlife being killed by vehicles.
